summary:
MARKETING:

Marketing and Business Development Professional with over  30 years of experience.

Experienced in brand identity,product sales & marketing, product development, strategic partnerships, social media, celebrity relations, & digital design.

Current & Past Clients:
Alveolar, MJC Strings, TremKing, Herbal Luna, Bruja Herbal, CBD Pound, 23 Hemp, Ethereal Flower, Carolina Hemp Company, Kingdom Harvest, Ethereal Flower, 23 Hemp, Wildwood Flower, Samsung, Phillips, Activision, Nintendo Wii, Nintendo DS, MTV Games, Green Apple, Guitar Hero, RockBand, Safety 1st, Malone Industrial, EA Games, P & G, Phillips TV, OnStar, sE Electronics, Halo Custom Guitars, Karma Audio, ITG Motorsports, Amethyst Beverage, Rock & Roll Tequila, Vixen Magazine

Specialties: Sales & Marketing, Brand Awareness & Publicity, Advertising, Social Media, Press Releases, Media Relations, Strategic Relationships, Project Management, Product Definition, Media Buying, Brand Management, Sales and Sales Management, Celebrity Relations, Graphic Design, Web-site Development & Hosting, Creative Content, Trade Show Planning and Management, International Product Sourcing, SEO (Search Engine Optimization)

MUSIC INDUSTRY:

A seasoned musician with over 30 years in the industry as a bass player. I have toured the world, enjoyed the cramped tour bus conditions, and enjoyed the energy of playing in front of over 100,000 on stage. 

Production Engineer for both live and studio, I have worked with many artists to make sure that they give the best they can give. The show must always go on and I was there to make sure that it always did with out a flaw.

Bands & Musicians I've worked with:
David Bowie, Chubby Checker, Three Dog Night, Prince, Kiss, Mark Boals, Motley Crue, Ministry, Down Factor, Pantera, Megadeth, Alice In Chains, Little Texas, Garth Brooks, Motor Head, NIN, Tin Machine, Britney Spears, Mana, Boyz II Men, BBD, Bone Thugs in Harmony, George Lopez, Metallica, Aerosmith, Depechemode, KMFDM, Marylin Manson, Ozzy Osbourne, Judas Priest, George Clinton & the P Funk Allstars, Red Hot Chilli Peppers, Janes Addiction, Ice Cube, Mary J Blige, Spice Girls, & more...

headline: Leader Nano Water Soluble Technology · Public Speaker · Cannabis & Hemp Consultant · Hemp Advocate · Marketing & Media Specialist · Professional Musician

message.text: We have Nano Hemp Derived D9 THC for $850 per kilo! DM me is you are interested in utilizing the Number 1 Nano Water Soluble in your products.

At Nano Lab Corporation, we're revolutionizing the cannabinol (CBD)  industry with our exclusive formula and process. Our nano emulsified cannabinoids offer water-soluble liquid and powder options, backed by years of research and development. Here's why our technology stands out:

Increased Efficacy: 
Our process breaks down traditional CBD molecules, increasing efficacy by up to 99%. Say goodbye to wasted CBD – our nano-sized molecules ensure maximum absorption.

Commercial Scale Production:
With facilities designed for massive commercial scale, we can produce thousands of water-soluble CBD kilos in record time. Whether you're a large-scale client or a smaller company, we've got you covered.

Water Soluble Innovation:
Our nano emulsion and amplification processes create molecules ranging from 15-60 nanometers, perfect for optimal absorption. Plus, our products are designed for various industries, from food and beverage to cosmetics and nutraceuticals.

Customer Value:
We're more than just a supplier – we're your partner from product conception to shelf-ready solutions. With professional support, quality assurances, and fair prices, we ensure a seamless experience every step of the way.

Ready to experience the future of CBD? 
Partner with Nano Hemp Tech Labs today and elevate your products with our Nano Water Soluble Technology. 

Contact us at www.nanolabcorp.com
